Comment: ..I enjoy playing with black...more aggressive openings in reserve...against d4 openings, things tend to get positional.
..black has a number of options here depending on taste. I tend to play a Benko, but KID, Nimzo and others offer attacking options too.

...this is quite sharp and black has to be careful. Taking the pawn (bxc) leads to quite hairy stuff for black. Decided to develop quickly as white only has a dark square bishop with no real targets to use...
...this normally prepares e4 with strong central push....blacks eventual plan will be 0-0 and e6, opening the f file.
